key_risks: Customer concentration risk due to heavy reliance on Windstream Holdings
High debt levels and reliance on debt financing
Regulatory and legal risks, including a $38.9 million settlement in a securities class action lawsuit
Merger and integration risks with Windstream
Intense competitive pressures from larger telecom infrastructure providers and new entrants
controversies: Windstream Holdings' bankruptcy and ongoing financial instability
Securities class action lawsuit resulting in a $38.9 million settlement
Notable insider trading activity, including share sales by SVP-Chief Revenue Officer Ronald J. Mudry
environmental_issues: Exposure to ESG risks due to reliance on fiber leasing, particularly in less populated markets
social_issues: Potential impact on communities due to expansion into underserved markets
governance_issues: High debt levels and financial flexibility concerns
Insider trading activity raising concerns about management confidence
